content.question: Shown above is a slope field for which of the following differential equations?

choices.label: <math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to x, equals, x plus y" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to x, equals, x y, minus 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to x, equals, 1 minus x, minus y" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to x, equals, x minus y, plus 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to x, equals, x minus y, plus 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Identify a re-expression of mathematical information presented in a given representation
